summary: Adds a new sword, Blazerend and reworks Chillrend. Note: This mod dosent change the normal chillrend, it adds its own, to ensure that the default stuff is left alone.
descriptionHtml: Adds 2 \"new\" weapons to the game, the first being a reworked Chillrend. It has no enchantment cost so can be used indefinatley and is set at the max level enchant (around 35 frost damage). Blazerend is the same but with fire. Both weapons are craft able and upgradeable requiring 5 fire/frost salts, a filled grand soul gem and a glass sdword to create. They require malachite and salts to upgrade. You need glass smithing and they are only obtainable at a forge.
author: Iodrome
